title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
The cart is at rest at t = 4 s and 18 s.

1 point is earned: For indicating both times that the car is at rest and not including any incorrect times

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
The speed of the cart is increasing during the intervals t = 4 to 9 s and 18 to 20 s.

2 points are earned: For each correct time interval one point was awarded.

One point was deducted for each incorrect interval, for a maximum two-point deduction.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned: For indicating that the acceleration is zero during the intervals of constant velocity, 12 to 17 s and 20 to 25 s

1 point is earned: For indicating that the acceleration is negative and constant from zero to 9 s, and positive and constant from 9 to 11 s and 17 to 20 s

1 point is earned: For having the correct values for two of the three intervals of non-zero accelerations:

–0.20 m/s2, +0.20 m/s2, and +0.40 m/s2

title: Part E
stimulusHtml:
• 1 point is earned: For using the correct kinematic equation, with the initial vertical velocity equal to zero

    y = 1 2 g t 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamyEaiabg2 da9maalaaabaGaaGymaaqaaiaaikdaaaGaam4zaiaadshadaahaaWc beqaaiaaikdaaaaaaa@3C4F@

    Solving for t:

    t = 2 y / g t = 2 ( 0.40  m) / 10  m/s 2 t = 0.28  s(or 0 .29 s using  g = 9.8  m/s 2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceaqabeaacaWG0b Gaeyypa0ZaaOaaaeaacaaIYaGaamyEaiaac+cacaWGNbaaleqaaaGc baGaamiDaiabg2da9maakaaabaGaaGOmaiaacIcacaaIWaGaaiOlai aaisdacaaIWaGaaeiiaiaab2gacaqGPaGaai4laiaaigdacaaIWaGa aeiiaiaab2gacaqGVaGaae4CamaaCaaaleqabaGaaGOmaaaaaeqaaa GcbaGaamiDaiabg2da9iaaicdacaGGUaGaaGOmaiaaiIdacaqGGaGa ae4CaiaabIcacaqGVbGaaeOCaiaabccacaqGWaGaaeOlaiaabkdaca qG5aGaaeiiaiaabohacaqGGaGaaeyDaiaabohacaqGPbGaaeOBaiaa bEgacaqGGaGaam4zaiabg2da9iaaiMdacaGGUaGaaGioaiaabccaca qGTbGaae4laiaabohadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaikdaaaGccaGGPaaaaaa@678F@

  • Using the kinematic equation for the horizontal motion:

    x = vxt

    1 point is earned: For using the correct value for the horizontal speed

    vx = 0.8 m/s

    x = (0.8 m/s)(0.28 s)

    1 point is earned: For the correct answer

    x = 0.22 m (or 0.23 m using g = 9.8 m/s2)
